TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DeprecatedAttribute extends ObjCRuntime.AvailabilityBaseAttribute

Docs.summary: Attribute indicating when an API was deprecated on a specific platform.
Docs.remarks: This class is a shortcut to create an AvailabilityBaseAttribute instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public DeprecatedAttribute (ObjCRuntime.PlatformName platform, ObjCRuntime.PlatformArchitecture architecture = ObjCRuntime.PlatformArchitecture.None, string message = null);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype ObjCRuntime.PlatformName platform, valuetype ObjCRuntime.PlatformArchitecture architecture, string message) cil managed
new ObjCRuntime.DeprecatedAttribute : ObjCRuntime.PlatformName * ObjCRuntime.PlatformArchitecture * string -> ObjCRuntime.DeprecatedAttribute

Docs.param: The platform this availability attribute applies to.
The architectures the attribute applies to (either only 32-bit, only 64-bit or both 32-bit and 64-bit architectures).
Additional information related to the availability information.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new availability attribute specifying that an API is deprecated on the specified platform.
